titleStmt.title: Mercvrivs pacificvs, or, Vox tvrtvris. A dove in this deluge of division sent from Gods arke, to present a peace-offering upon the altar of Iehovah Shalom, humbly proposing a divine direction for composing of controversies according to Gods revealed will. by E. M. Gent.
titleStmt.author: E. M., Gent.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: the 4 in the imprint date is crossed out and altered to 1643; "March 2nd 1643".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
